entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
